project_name.description: Project name (use underscores, e.g., retail_analytics, supply_chain_ops)

demo_description.description: Detailed description of your demo (be as specific as possible - this helps Cursor AI build your demo). Example: 'A retail analytics dashboard showing customer segmentation, sales trends, and inventory management. Include real-time transaction processing, customer lifetime value analysis, and predictive analytics for demand forecasting. Use modern charts and KPIs.'

industry.description: Industry focus: retail, supply_chain, finance, healthcare, manufacturing, telecom

complexity.description: Demo complexity: simple (dashboards), standard (dashboards + OLTP), advanced (dashboards + OLTP + LLM agents)

catalog_name.description: Unity Catalog name (will be created if it doesn't exist)

schema_name.description: Schema name (will be created if it doesn't exist)

data_scale.description: Data volume: small (1K records), medium (10K), large (100K)
